item.description:
Good Morning Everyone:

I hope everyone is having a good week so far. On Saturday, it is looking like a perfect golf day. I have two tees times, one for 12:48 pm and the other for 12:56 pm. We have 5 people so far and need three others for another foursome. Please email me back and let me know you are all interested and I look forward to hearing from all of you.

Have a good rest of your week. I look forward to hearing back from everyone. My cell number is 617-640-9634 if anyone has any questions.

Robin

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Golf-Hillview Country Club-North Reading
